marklogic.body: If I were fool enough to think that giving to the Obama campaigh were some kind of investment in America, sure, I'd pony up a 5 Spot, but its anything but. Osama bin Laden was probably jealous of Obama bin Lyin'. Why? Osama could only drean of damaging America from the inside a tiny fraction as much as Obama has done. Froget about the "Bush recession", its now the Obama Depression! And he wants for more years to FINISH US OFF!
